header.title: Add New Property
header.subtitle: List your property in just 3 simple steps

step2.title: Photos & Features
step2.dragDropText: Drag and drop photos here, or click to browse
step2.photosHint: Optional: Add photos to help renters visualize your property

step3.title: Review & Submit
step3.termsConfirm: I confirm that I own or have permission to list this property and agree to the

validation.addressInvalid: Please enter a valid property address (minimum 5 characters).
validation.cityInvalid: Please enter a valid city name.
validation.zipInvalid: Please enter a valid zip code (e.g., 12345 or 12345-6789).
validation.termsRequired: Please agree to the terms and conditions.
validation.photoTooLarge: {{name}} is too large. Maximum size is 10MB.
validation.authRequired: Please log in to add a property.
validation.landlordOnly: Only landlords can add properties. Please contact support to upgrade your account.
validation.authenticationFailed: Authentication required. Please log in again.
validation.landlordVerificationRequired: Please verify your landlord account first.
validation.duplicateProperty: You have already listed a property with this address and zip code.
validation.rateLimitExceeded: You have reached the maximum number of properties you can add per hour (10). Please try again later.
validation.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.

success.title: Property Listed Successfully!
success.message: Your property at {{address}} has been added to RentReviews.
